original: 傳說中的女仙人。明帝時城門校尉王剛之女，王魯連見父親得道，從此志於修道。在陸沈山得仙人授以飛升之法，修行圓滿後白日飛升。
text: The legendary female fairy. During the Ming Dynasty, the daughter of Wang Gang, the city gate school lieutenant, Wang Lulian saw his father gain the Tao, and since then he has been determined to cultivate the Tao. In Lu Chenshan, the immortal taught him the method of ascension, and he ascended in the day after completing his practice.
